definition: illustrious hero, spirit of the place (idiom); a place derives reflected glory from an illustrious son
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
hero/heroic/outstanding person/prominent/distinguished
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
quick/alert/efficacious/effective/to come true/spirit/departed soul/coffin

sentences.english: My company is located in outstanding people.
Shangyu is a place with remarkable people coming forth in large numbers.
sentences.chinese: 上虞就是這樣一個人傑地靈人才輩出的地方啊。

sentences.english: Spring town has a long history, outstanding people, is the seat of the ancient Yue state capital.
sentences.chinese: 泉水鎮歷史悠久，人傑地靈，是古越州府所在地。

sentences.english: Hunan is a place of greatness and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 湖南是一個人傑地靈，景色秀美的地方。

sentences.english: My hometown is in ningxiang, here beautiful, and the product is rich.
sentences.chinese: 我的家鄉在寧鄉，這裏人傑地靈，物產豐富。

sentences.english: Here old times, traffic developed, and materials, Tianbao, a beautiful environment.
sentences.chinese: 這裏人傑地靈，交通發達，物華天寶，環境優美。

sentences.english: Here is an inspiring place producing outstanding and talented people.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，人傑地靈，羣賢薈萃。

sentences.english: The city showcases the East and the West and produces outstanding people.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市薈萃中西文化，人傑地靈。

sentences.english: Tangyin has a long history and outstanding people.
sentences.chinese: 湯陰曆史悠久，人傑地靈。

sentences.english: Jiangxian Economic Development Zone, located in Shanxi has a long history, outstanding people.
sentences.chinese: 山西絳縣經濟開發區所在地歷史悠久，人傑地靈。

sentences.english: The business enterprise be located in thous all Xian, the outstanding personality ground work properly, the great talent constellate.
sentences.chinese: 企業座落在古都西安，人傑地靈，英才薈萃。
